item.title: New module: chemistry/ocean version 2.9.7

item.title: New module: math/tetgen version 1.6.0
item.description: TetGen provides various features to generate good quality and adaptive tetrahedral meshes suitable for numerical methods, such as finite element or finite volume methods.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: physics/py-namaster version 1.2.2_py36
item.description: NaMaster is a C library, Python module and standalone program to compute full-sky angular cross-power spectra of masked fields with arbitrary spin and an arbitrary number of known contaminants using a pseudo-Cl (aka MASTER) approach.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ffmpeg version 5.0
item.description: FFmpeg is the leading multimedia framework, able to decode, encode, transcode, mux, demux, stream, filter and play pretty much anything that humans and machines have created.
